name: Code Integrity Solutions
tag_list: source-code-analysis, sca, static-analysis, coverity, klocwork, electric-cloud, consulting, quickstart, quality, security, bug, defect, build, hudson, java, c, visual-studio, continuous-integration, agile
overview:
Code Integrity Solutions provides a wide range of services to help software development organizations get the full value from their software development tools investment. Code Integrity Solutions provides quickstart services, analysis tuning, performance optimization, deployment support and training services for static source code analysis tools and build solutions. Code Integrity Solutions provides both packaged and custom services.

The Code Integrity Solutions team comprises software developers and managers highly experienced in static source code analysis and build systems. Code Integrity Solutions is an official partner of Coverity, Klocwork and Electric Cloud and provides assistance to companies worldwide.
